paper: Training-Free Spectral Fingerprints of Voice Processing in Transformers

differences.summary: Undefined layer indexing and model-version mixing
differences.why_impacts_score: reduces clarity and consistency; hinders replication

evidence.baseline_quote: without item-level details, prompt templates, or full language lists for each model
evidence.final_quote: fractional layer labels such as '2.5' appear without definition; behavioral validation relies on Qwen‑2.2‑7b vs Qwen2.5‑7B

differences.summary: Missing tabulated exemplars and unsupported cited values
differences.why_impacts_score: casts doubt on evidence reliability and transparency

evidence.baseline_quote: Tokenization controls are “light”… no comprehensive reporting of drift distributions across languages or models.
evidence.final_quote: exemplar values mentioned in the text are not directly tabulated; No direct evidence found for all cited exemplars

differences.why_impacts_score: weakens validity of significance and correlation claims

evidence.baseline_quote: FDR corrections are applied “within each model family”… multiplicity concerns… Spearman vs. Pearson differences
evidence.final_quote: claims of “FDR–sig” are not accompanied by visible q-values; ambiguity between Δλ2 and |Δλ2| in correlations

differences.summary: Potential degeneracy in head aggregation weighting
differences.why_impacts_score: undermines technical soundness of spectral aggregation

evidence.baseline_quote: Head aggregation relies on mass weighting… justification for αh choices is empirical… learned convex combinations
evidence.final_quote: row‑stochastic A^(ℓ,h); s_h = ∑ A_{ij}^{(ℓ,h)} can collapse to a constant; default effectively uniform

differences.summary: Internal inconsistencies between figures and appendix
differences.why_impacts_score: creates confusion about results and generalization

evidence.baseline_quote: Some figure captions and values are approximate or low-resolution… numerical summaries differ across sections
evidence.final_quote: Qwen overall mean in Table 6 vs earlier narrative; Figures 3–4 vs Appendix expanded results

differences.summary: Ablation implementation details and aggregation undefined

evidence.baseline_quote: ablation mechanism… and evaluation language/items are not detailed; no behavioral measurements post-ablation
evidence.final_quote: whether applied only at inference, and how “Overall” is aggregated are not detailed

differences.summary: Lowered clarity score citing undefined notation and mixing
differences.why_impacts_score: explicitly reduces clarity rating due to added issues

evidence.baseline_quote: Clarity (10): 7 — … incomplete dataset/prompt details and some low-resolution/inconsistent figures
evidence.final_quote: Clarity (10): 6 — … undefined fractional layer notation, model-version mixing, and low-resolution/inconsistent figures
